scripts.cp-mac: cargo build --release && rm -rfv builds/* && node scripts/cp-version.js && scp builds/* rsync-user@calcit-lang.org:/web-assets/repo/calcit-lang/binaries/macos/
scripts.try-js-brk: cargo run --bin cr -- calcit/test.cirru --emit-js -1 && node --inspect-brk js-out/main.mjs
scripts.try-js: cargo run --bin cr -- calcit/test.cirru --emit-js -1 && node js-out/main.mjs
